thread.title: FLSmidth signs contract with Russian cement and minerals producer
thread.title_full: FLSmidth signs contract with Russian cement and minerals producer

title: FLSmidth signs contract with Russian cement and minerals producer
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Jul 8, 2015, 13:17 BST - UK Markets close in 3 hrs 13 mins FLSmidth signs contract with Russian cement and minerals producer Press Release : FLSmidth â€“ 7 minutes ago -4.70 
PRESS RELEASE 
During a ceremony at the International Industry Trade Fair INNOPROM-2015 in Ekaterinburg, Russia, FLSmidth has today signed a contract with the Russian cement and minerals producer Pikalevo Soda for the supply of equipment for a dry sintering alumina line with a capacity of 3700 tonnes per day. 
The signing of the contract took place in the presence of the Prime Minister of Russia Mr. Medvedev and FLSmidth`s Group CEO Thomas Schulz. 
In April 2011 during a state visit of Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin to Denmark, an agreement on future cooperation between the two parties was signed in the Danish capital Copenhagen (see Company Announcement No. 08-2011, 26 April 2011) and this has now resulted in a signed contract. 
Once the necessary pre-conditions in the contract have been finalised and the contract therefore becomes binding, we will immediately inform the market.
